Hello! We're glad you noticed our commitment to transparency. In regards to unsold products, if a buyer declines or passes on a product, we do not force the sale. Instead, we carefully evaluate each item to ensure it still meets our quality standards. If it doesn't, we may either reevaluate its pricing or remove it from our inventory. Our aim is to maintain a high-quality selection for our valued customers.
